acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Ashok Bherial is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date. He has expressed inability to engage any lawyer to defend him. Hence Mr. Shymal Shil, an Advocate, Diphu Bar Association from the panel prepared by the DLSA, Karbi Anglong is hereby appointed as Legal Aid Counsel. Inform all concerned accordingly.            Copy is furnished to him. Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of the both sides as well as the case diary I find the accused person has committed the offence under section 8 of the POCSO Act and accordingly the charge was framed. The particular of the offence charge is duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried.           Fixing 16.09.2019 for evidence
Accused  is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PW Smt. Binita Gogoi Buragohain is examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs

Accused Ashok Bherial is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date..        PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs returned without proper service. Issue fresh summons to PWs.          Fixing 14.10.2019 for Production  F/Evi.
PO is on long vacation. Accused produced from jail hazot and further remanded till next date. pws absent. re issue summon to pws.
Accused is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PWs absent. summons not returned. Issue fresh
Accused  is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.         PWs  Basanti Borgohain is examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs

Accused Ashok Bherial is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.      PW Sri Kongseng Borgohain is present. He is examined and his cross-examination is declined and he is discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs.    Fixing 03/12/19 for Prodcution  Further Evidence
PO is on leave.             Accused  is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.  PWs absent. Summon issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summon

Court work is disrupted due to agitation.    Accused Ashok Bherial is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.      PW Smt. Rupali Toppo is examined and discharged      Fixing 30.12.19 for production  F/Evi.

Accused is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.         PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not yet  returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.       Fixing 08.01.20 for Production F/Evi.

Accused Ashok Bherial is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.     PW Miss Pingki Kumari is present but she could not be examined due her illness. Considering she is allowed to go PR bond of Rs. 100/-.         Fixing 22.01.20 for production                                      F/Evidence.
Accused  is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PW pingki Kumari is examined cross-examined and discharged.

Case record is received on transfer from Honourable court of Sessions Judge for disposal. Accused Ashok Bherial is produced from jail hazot. He is again remanded to jail hazot till next date.The M.O. was present who was examined, cross-examined and discharged.Issue summon to the informant

accd Ashok Bherial produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.     the informant was present who aws examined, cross examined and discharged.       issue summons to witness Sani Tapo in his correct name and address.
accd Ashok Bherial produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.        one PW was present who was examined and discharged, cross declined         issue summons to the IO.
accd Ashok Bherial produced from jail hazot through video conferencing and remanded till next date,     IO absent, issue summons to IO
court works disrupted due to COVID 19 National Lockdown
